duration_raw: until the end of the target's next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Physical Boost](/Spells.aspx?ID=533)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 407 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 living creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of the target's next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You temporarily improve the target's physique. The target gains a +2 status bonus to the next Acrobatics check, Athletics check, Fortitude save, or Reflex save it attempts.
name: Physical Boost
